name: Greed Island (Nikhil Pathania)
description:
It's a multiplayer online 3D shooting game where the user can create and join the room. you can play with your friends one room contain max 8 players the are currently 2 maps in which you can play.

 Made in Unity game engine using c# for the backed.

Some features are:

lightweight

multiplayer server

multiple weapons and characters to choose with great animation
